childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Hello ðŸ‘‹ I'm Christopher Ramos (a fluent spanish speaker), an aspiring software developer and UI/UX developer based in California, whose focus is on simplicity and extensibility. I love developing exceptional websites and web apps that provide intuitive, pixel-perfect user interfaces while being clean and efficient behind the scenes.

I am currently attending Mt. SAC College pursuing an Associates Degree in Computer Science. I have always designed and made websites as a hobby but have now decided to take it into a more professional direction. I enjoy constantly learning and improving my skills with the many technologies that power the web!

This Blog/Portfolio is built with [Gatsbyjs](https://gatsbyjs.org), [Rebass](https://jxnblk.com/rebass/) (styled-component system), [Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/), and hosted by [Netlify](https://netlify.com). Feel free to explore the rest of the page and my projects.
